unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi remains crucial. We've seen excellent recruits like Priya Sharma excel. Maintaining relationships with institutions like IIM Ahmedabad is key. We aim to identify talent early, reflecting the ethos of "3 Idiots"—excellence over rote learning. This FY24, our target is 20 hires with packages starting at Rs. 15 lakh. We are also expanding our outreach to Tier-2 colleges within 500 km radius of Bangalore.
normalised: Campus hiring at I I T Delhi remains crucial. We've seen excellent recruits like Priya Sharma excel. Maintaining relationships with institutions like I I M Ahmedabad is key. We aim to identify talent early, reflecting the ethos of "three Idiots"—excellence over rote learning. This F Y twenty four, our target is twenty hires with packages starting at rupee fifteen lakh. We are also expanding our outreach to Tier-two colleges within five hundred kilometer radius of Bangalore.
